title: How does Google Classroom help teachers and students? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'll just mention a couple highlights, I'm certain others will add their favorite features. Communication. I can message all my students without us knowing each other's personal information. (I also use Remind) Feedback. I prefer seeing a list of assignments turned in electronically that I can provide feedback. I find it easier to type messages than handwrite. If the student makes corrections I can use the Google Doc history function to track those changes. Accountability. No more “I turned it in YOU lost it". Convenience. I can post a FAQ, or frequently used references, syllabus, rubrics, etc. and they will be available 24/7 and never misplaced, worn out, or alerted. I can't image not having an e classroom available. It's just a natural
